properties.name: campaignId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Add contact to a campaign

properties.name: Remove
properties.description: Remove contact from a campaign

properties.name: companyId
properties.description: The ID of the company

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the company to create

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: customFieldsUi
properties.description: Adds a custom fields to set also values which have not been predefined

properties.name: fieldValue
properties.description: Value of the field to set

properties.name: industry
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: overwriteWithBlank
properties.description: Whether empty values are set to fields. Otherwise empty values are skipped.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: orderBy
properties.description: Column to sort by. Can use any column listed in the response. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: search
properties.description: String or search command to filter entities by

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a company

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get data of a company

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get data of many companies

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a company

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address of the contact

properties.name: company
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: bodyJson
properties.description: Contact parameters

properties.name: ipAddress
properties.description: IP address to associate with the contact

properties.name: lastActive
properties.description: Date/time in UTC;

properties.name: ownerId
properties.description: ID of a Mautic user to assign this contact to

properties.name: stage
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: tags
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

properties.name: comments
properties.description: A text describing details of Do Not Contact entry

properties.name: points
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: publishedOnly
properties.description: Whether to return currently published entities

properties.name: minimal
properties.description: Whether to return array of entities without additional lists in it

properties.name: rawData
properties.description: By default only the data of the fields get returned. If this options gets set the RAW response with all data gets returned.

properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.description: Add/remove contacts from/to the do not contact list

properties.name: Send Email
properties.description: Send email to contact
